 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּשַׁל‎</span> **verb** ==stumble, stagger, totter== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Syriac [<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">] ***give offence*** (occasion for stumbling), <span class="bdbLangGreek">σκανδαλιζω,</span> (chiefly Ethpe\`el Aph\`el), see [[BDB#PS|PS]] [[BDB#Brock|Brock]] [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***be heavy, sluggish***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Neh.4.4|Neh 4:4]] +, ([[Hos.5.5|Hos 5:5]]b read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכָּשֵׁל‎</span>, compare [[BDB#We|We]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּֽשְׁלָה‎</span> [[Isa.3.8|Isa 3:8]]; [[Isa.59.14|Isa 59:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּֽשְׁלוּ‎</span> [[Jer.46.6|Jer 46:6]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּשַׁלְנוּ‎</span> [[Isa.59.10|Isa 59:10]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יכשׁ֑ולו‎</span> [[Prov.4.16|Prov 4:16]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] (but read Hiph\`il, q. v., so [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יכשׁלו‎</span> [[Nah.3.3|Nah 3:3]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] (but read Perfect <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְכָֽשְׁלוּ‎</span> so [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]); ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּשׁוֺל‎</span> [[Isa.40.30|Isa 40:30]] (c. Niph\`al Imperfect); ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כּוֺשֵׁל‎</span> [[Isa.5.27|Isa 5:27]] + 2 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כּשֵׁל‎</span> [[2Chr.28.15|2Chr 28:15]] Paslm [[2Chr.105.37|2Chr 105:37]] feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כּשְׁלוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.35.3|Isa 35:3]] — 

**1.** ***stumble*** at, over, something, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> (literally ***by means of***), [[Nah.3.3|Nah 3:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּבּוֺר בְּגִבּוֺר כ‎</span> [[Jer.46.13|Jer 46:13]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפַל‎</span>), compare [[Lev.26.37|Lev 26:37]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּנְעָרִיס בָּעֵץ כ‎</span> [[Lam.5.13|Lam 5:13]] i.e. ***stagger*** (of toil in captivity); absolute [[Isa.5.27|Isa 5:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ׅ‎</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(עָיֵף‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּֽשְׁלוּ וְנָפָ֑לוּ‎</span> [[Jer.46.6|Jer 46:6]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְבָּה כּוֺשֵׁ֑ל גַּםנָֿפַל אישׁ וגו‎</span> v[[Jer.46.16|Jer 46:16]] (strange; [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] following in part [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶרְבְּךָ כָּשַׁל וְנָפַל‎</span> ***thy mixed people*** — compare [[Jer.25.20|Jer 25:20]], etc. — ***hath stumbled and hath fallen***); often figurative of overthrow, throughdivine judgment, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> ***at***, (see above) [[Jer.6.21|Jer 6:21]], so [[Isa.8.15|Isa 8:15]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפַל‎</span> etc.) according to [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] Bhul [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Di|Di]]; &lt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּם‎</span> = ***among them***, — Israel and Judah, — as <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> in v[[Isa.8.16|Isa 8:16]], so [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] EV; [[Hos.4.5|Hos 4:5]] (twice in verse); [[Hos.5.5|Hos 5:5]]; [[Hos.14.2|Hos 14:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲוֺנֶָֽךָ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> probably instrumental); absolute of Babylon, under figure of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָדוֺן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ונפל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Jer.50.32|Jer 50:32]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ונפל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> Paslm [[Jer.27.2|Jer 27:2]]; [[Isa.3.8|Isa 3:8]]; [[Isa.31.3|Isa 31:3]] (both \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפל‎</span>); of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱמֶת‎</span> [[Isa.59.14|Isa 59:14]] in metaphor of anxiety, distress [[Isa.59.10|Isa 59:10]], Paslm [[Isa.107.12|Isa 107:12]]. 

**2.** ***totter***, of knees, literal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִצּוֺם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּרְכַּי כ‎</span> Paslm [[Isa.109.24|Isa 109:24]] ***my knees totter from fasting***; figurative [[Isa.35.3|Isa 35:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדַיִם רָפוֺת‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כּוֺשֵׁל‎</span> ***tottering one***, literal [[Job.4.4|Job 4:4]]; [[2Chr.28.15|2Chr 28:15]] Paslm [[2Chr.105.37|2Chr 105:37]] hence figurative, ***fail***, of strength (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּחַ‎</span>) [[Neh.4.4|Neh 4:4]] Paslm [[Neh.31.11|Neh 31:11]] — Infinitive absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּשׁוֺל‎</span>, see below Niph\`al **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִכְשַׁל‎</span> [[Dan.11.9|Dan 11:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִכְשְׁלוּ‎</span> v[[Dan.11.33|Dan 11:33]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִכְשָׁ֑לוּ‎</span> v[[Dan.11.14|Dan 11:14]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכָּשֵׁל‎</span> [[Ezek.33.12|Ezek 33:12]] + [[Hos.5.5|Hos 5:5]]b ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]. as v<sup>a,</sup> so [[BDB#We|We]]; [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּשַׁל‎</span>), 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּכָּשֵׁל‎</span> [[Prov.4.12|Prov 4:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּכָּֽשְׁלוּ‎</span> [[Prov.24.17|Prov 24:17]] (yet see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:51»§ 51</sup>, R. 1), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּהִכָּֽשְׁלָם‎</span> [[Dan.11.34|Dan 11:34]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִכְשָׁל‎</span> [[Zech.12.8|Zech 12:8]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִכְשָׁלִים‎</span> [[1Sam.2.4|1Sam 2:4]] — 

**1.** ***stumble*** (= **Qal**) [[Nah.2.6|Nah 2:6]]; [[Isa.63.13|Isa 63:13]]; [[Jer.31.9|Jer 31:9]] usually figurative: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of misfortune [[Prov.24.17|Prov 24:17]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפל‎</span>), negative [[Prov.4.12|Prov 4:12]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of divine judgement (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> ***at***) [[Prov.4.19|Prov 4:19]]; [[Prov.24.16|Prov 24:16]], negative [[Ezek.33.12|Ezek 33:12]] see also [[Hos.14.10|Hos 14:10]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְ‎</span> location), [[Jer.20.11|Jer 20:11]]; [[Dan.11.14|Dan 11:14]]; [[Dan.11.35|Dan 11:35]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכָּֽשְׁלוּ וְיאֹבְדוּ מִפָּנֶיךָ‎</span> [[Ps.9.4|Ps 9:4]] especially = ***be overthrown***, of nations, armies, etc., [[Hos.5.5|Hos 5:5]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲוֺנָם‎</span>, compare [[Hos.14.2|Hos 14:2]] **Qal**), [[Jer.6.15|Jer 6:15]] \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפל‎</span>, compare [[Jer.8.12|Jer 8:12]] (\|\| ***id.***), [[Dan.11.19|Dan 11:19]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפל‎</span>), v[[Dan.11.33|Dan 11:33]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְ‎</span> instrumental), v[[Dan.11.34|Dan 11:34]] v[[Dan.11.41|Dan 11:41]]. 

**2.** ***be tottering, feeble***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּשׁוֺל יִכָּשֵׁ֑לוּ‎</span> [[Isa.40.30|Isa 40:30]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחֲלִיפוּ כֹחַ‎</span> v[[Isa.40.31|Isa 40:31]]); so participle [[1Sam.2.4|1Sam 2:4]]; [[Zech.12.8|Zech 12:8]]. **Pi\`el** only apparent, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּכַשְּׁלִי‎</span> [[Ezek.36.14|Ezek 36:14]], read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּשַׁכְּלִי‎</span> with [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] EV [[BDB#Sm|Sm]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Da|Da]] (see also **Hiph\`il** ***near the end***). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכְשִׁיל‎</span> [[Lam.1.14|Lam 1:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכְשַׁלְתֶּם‎</span> [[Mal.2.8|Mal 2:8]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַכְשִׁילְךָ‎</span> [[2Chr.25.8|2Chr 25:8]] 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּכְשִׁלִי‎</span> [[Ezek.36.15|Ezek 36:15]] (but strike out [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Co|Co]]; read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תשׁכלי‎</span>, as v[[Ezek.36.14|Ezek 36:14]] other [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Sm|Sm]] [[BDB#Da|Da]]); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַכְשִׁילוּ‎</span> [[Prov.4.16|Prov 4:16]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] see below **Qal**), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּכְשִׁילֻהוּ‎</span> Paslm [[Prov.64.9|Prov 64:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּכְשִׁלוּם‎</span> [[Jer.18.15|Jer 18:15]] (so [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]; [[BDB#Gie|Gie]], after [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]. [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּכְשְׁלוּ‎</span>, [&lt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּכָּֽשִׁלוּ‎</span>]); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכְשִׁיל‎</span> [[2Chr.25.8|2Chr 25:8]], sf <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכְשִׁילוֺ‎</span> [[2Chr.28.23|2Chr 28:23]] — 

**1.** ***cause to stumble***, figurative: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** = ***bring injury*** or ***ruin to***, abs [[Prov.4.16|Prov 4:16]] of punishment [[Ps.64.9|Ps 64:9]] (indefinite subject; si vera lectio; text probably corrupt, see [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** = ***overthrow***, of nation, army, etc., [[2Chr.25.8|2Chr 25:8]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי אוֺיֵב‎</span>) compare v[[2Chr.25.8|2Chr 25:8]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עזר‎</span>); ***cause overthrow*** [[2Chr.28.23|2Chr 28:23]]. — On [[Ezek.36.15|Ezek 36:15]] see above 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** morally, [[Jer.18.15|Jer 18:15]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> local), [[Mal.2.8|Mal 2:8]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> instrumental). 

**2.** ***make feeble, weak***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכְשִׁיל כֹּחִי‎</span> [[Lam.1.14|Lam 1:14]] (of God's dealing with Jerusalem) **Hoph\`al** only ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎והיו מֻכְשָׁלִים לְפָנֶיךָ‎</span> [[Jer.18.23|Jer 18:23]] either ***and let them be ones who have stumbled before thee***, i.e. regard them as such ([[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Gf|Gf]] [[BDB#VB|VB]]), or ***and let them be ones overthrown before thee*** (Gie; so [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] according to [[BDB#Gf|Gf]]). So also in [[Ezek.21.20|Ezek 21:20]] according to [[BDB#Co|Co]], compare [[BDB#Sm|Sm]] [[BDB#Da|Da]] ([[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְשֹׁלִים‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְשׁוֺל‎</span>).
